segments.text: I'd like to speak with the apartment manager , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is he . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm interested in the apartment on Main Street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's still available . Do you want to see it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I would very much like to see it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does today at 6 p . m . sound okay to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no problem with 6 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I'll see you at 6 o'clock . Do you need any directions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . I already drove by to see what the neighborhood looks like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have an application form with me . You can fill it out if you're interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I bring anything with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I only need to check your driver's license .
segments.speaker: S2
